responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "1E454BF2458FD4C9E63B36AC886FF15E", "Because we\'re severely strained under the current circumstances, we must avail ourselves of every resource available to us. Pursue whatever means necessary to make ends meet. With the undead ahead of us and the goblins at our backs, retreat will not be an option. We reinforce our courage and stand our ground. Take my advice: stay sharp, and keep your wits about you. Firm our grips on our weapons and we charge forward with wills of steel.")
name: MADD_0010_CoC_WillardTugsby_94
